root.name: Alter Echo
root.description: OverviewAlter Echo is a futuristic third-person action game where people called "shapers" can transform into any object using a substance called Plast. You play as a young shaper named Nevin and start the game searching on a strange planet for the creator, Paavo, of a new and improved Plast called "EchoPlast". While poking around the planet, Nevin and his spaceship get attacked by Paavo himself having gone mad from the power of the EchoPlast. The EchoPlast becomes conscious and comes into contact with Nevin, becoming a sweet EchoPlast suit and letting him know he has to stop Paavo before he destroys all of humanity.
